title: 307 I am Coming To The Cross

lines: 1.I am coming to the cross; I am poor, and weak, and blind; I am counting all but dross; I shall full salvation find.
Refrain : I am trusting, Lord, in Thee, O Thou Lamb of Calvary; Humbly at Thy cross I bow; Save me, Jesus, save me now.
2. Long my heart Has sighed for Thee; Long has evil reigned within; Jesus sweetly speaks to me, I will cleanse you from all sin.
3. Here I give my all to Thee Friends, and time, And earthly store; Soul and body Thine to be, Wholly Thine forevermore.
4. Jesus comes! He fills my soul! Perfected in Him I am; I am ever whit made whole Glory, glory to the Lamb!
